messages.content: trNodes are custom node modules for ComfyUI.
To install trNodes, clone the repo under `ComfyUI/custom_nodes` and then install dependencies using the `python.exe -m pip install opencv-python scikit-image blendmodes` command.
What does the image_layering Node do?
The image_layering node adds 1-3 layers of image on top of one another and removes the white background to use it as transparent layers.
What does the color_correction Node do?
The color_correction node adjusts the color of the target image according to another image and is ported from the stable diffusion WebUI.
What does the model_router Node do?
The model_router node batch reroutes `model`, `clip`, `vae`, `condition_1`, and `condition_2` for a cleaner workflow.
Are there any recommended external nodes for trNodes?

The WAS Node suite on Civitai offers an 'Image Blend by Mask' node that blends two images using a mask and is recommended as part of its node suite. Additionally, the link https://civitai.com/models/24869/comfyui-custom-nodes-by-xss is suggested for exploring more custom nodes.
